works.description:
Interview with Clive Barker, by David Alexander, from The Edge magazine, beginning with You've taken to describing yourself as a fabulist. How would you define 'fabulist' and 'fabulism'?
The term fabulist was primarily used about South American magical realists – 

This actually appears in search results before the page on our own site. No permission was ever requested. It would, in any case, have been denied. They could simply run a link. In fact, they appear to have stolen from many other sources; follow the back button at the foot of their page to see a long list. Some of the material is linked to, some just taken and posted onto their site.
